com.paypal.android.sdk.payments
Class PaymentActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      com.paypal.android.sdk.payments.PaymentActivity

public final class PaymentActivity
extends Activity

Primary Activity for simple payments with the PayPal Android SDK. Integration point for third party applications..

Responsible for the initiating the transaction & returning the result. You should not attempt to interact with any other activity in this SDK for simple payments.

Important note:

This is a proof of payment system. You MUST verify all transactions via a call from your servers (not your app) to PayPal's servers, to ensure that the transaction was genuine and successful. The proof of payment will be returned as EXTRA_RESULT_CONFIRMATION.

The activity will have android.app.Activity#RESULT_OK if the payment was processed or Activity#RESULT_CANCELED if the user canceled it. If your app submits an invalid payment, it may return RESULT_EXTRAS_INVALID. All other errors will be handled by the SDK.

EXTRA_PAYMENT

public static final String EXTRA_PAYMENT
Parcelable extra. Required. Contains PayPalPayment payment information.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

RESULT_EXTRAS_INVALID

public static final int RESULT_EXTRAS_INVALID
A resultCode indicating that the input PayPalPayment object or the PayPalConfiguration object provided when the service was started is not valid. The payment was not attempted. PayPal UI will not be presented.

EXTRA_RESULT_CONFIRMATION

public static final String EXTRA_RESULT_CONFIRMATION
A PaymentConfirmation parcelable extra containing all of the information your server needs to verify the payment.
